translations: v.首次上演；首次露面（premiere 的现在分词）
v.<罕>首次上演；首次露面（premier 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: GM is premiering its all-electric Volt MPV5 concept car and a Chinese-made minivan and a compact sedan.
sentences.translation: 通用公司首次推出其全电气式伏特mpv5型概念车、一款中国制造的小型货车和一款紧凑型轿车。

sentences.sentence: I saw Requiem for a Dream because it was premiering at Cannes and Darren was adamant that I come see it.
sentences.translation: 我看了《梦之安魂曲》，因为当时在戛纳首映，达伦坚持要我去看。

sentences.sentence: Premiering on July 20, the South Korean TV series W-Two Worlds interprets "W" as "double u"–double universe.
sentences.translation: 韩剧《W-两个世界》于7月20日首播，在剧中，W可理解为“两个u”——两个平行世界。
